name: com.anyg.brg-rendersystem
description: Focuses on rendering a large number of static (or rarely modified) scene objects with lower CPU overhead by using BatchRendererGroup.

samples.description: A minimalist Hello World sample created with BRG Container tool.
A simple sample that shows how to create a BRG Container instance.
A simple sample that shows how to create a batch for drawing some objects.
A sample that shows how to set and read instance data.
A sample that shows how to use material properties.
A sample that shows how to add LOD support.
